column4: I've got a problem; I'm trying to install Wine in Kubuntu, but I don't know how to change the repositories in Kynaptic. When I try to install it with apt-get, it says: "E: malformed line 28 in source list", while I don't find any errors.
did you do: apt-get install wine ?
yes, I did that. My line 28 is : deb-src http://wine.sourceforge.net/apt/source/
